revised_title: The Lethal Effects of Oenanthe Aquatica: A Case Study
tldr: This article narrates a case study of a man who died after consuming the juice of the poisonous plant Oenanthe aquatica, also known as Hemlock Dropwort. The symptoms he experienced, such as convulsions, loss of senses, and profuse sweating, were similar to those observed in French prisoners who were poisoned by the same plant. The author emphasizes the importance of raising awareness about the dangers of this plant to save lives.
